intro: On your blocks, get set, go!
description:
Exciting swimming duels for single players and teams!

Dive into fast-paced competitions! Choose your athlete, swim for the best times in freestyle or relay and challenge friends locally – or play solo against clever AI opponents. Perfect for a quick round in between!

• Choose your favourite character and put together your team
• Compete in two exciting swimming disciplines: freestyle and freestyle relay
• Play solo or locally with up to 4 people
